title: Hiking!
desc: we offer a whole list of hikes in a wide variety of style. alone or in group ? , single day or mulitiple days ?, with or without a guide ? we have it all

title: Friends and socials!
desc: Make new friends and go hike with new people, invite them for a hike or send them a quick message at anytime
subTitle: Make new friends while walking!

title: Stats tracker!
desc: See all your stats in 1 place. things such as your amount of KM walked, est. hours walked etc..!
subTitle: 1 place, all your statistics!
